title: Caps for days
body:
I JUST DOWNLOAD THE LAUNCHER AND IT CAN'T BE TURN ON

replies.body: These logs aren't telling me too much unfortunately, but it sounds like there might be a security setting that could block your patcher from launching.  The steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should fix this up!
